:::config { "language": "alpine"}
// torchlight! {"copyable": true}
<p x-html="{
    prop: "Testing",
    init() {
        this.isPrettyNeatRight();  // actual comment [tl! here]
    },

    test() {
        console.log('testing'); // [tl! here]
    },

}"></p>
:::expectation

        console.log(&#039;testing&#039;);
